## AddZipFileOption.remoteDir property

The remote directory where the zip file will be extracted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remoteDir?: string;
```

## Remarks

This should be a relative path from the current working directory of the remote function. If not specified, it defaults to `path.basename(zipFileName, ".zip")`<!-- -->. For example, if the local zip file is `foo/bar.zip`<!-- -->, the zip file will be extracted to `./bar` on the remote side. If the directory does not exist, it will be created.
